about_the_game:
The instant that the helmet settled into place, the very essence of Talis was pushed to a small corner of his mind, a mere observer to the Chaos that now sought to reshape Northanda in its twisted image.

In a realm veiled by shadow and flame, the Sanctuary of Lumina stands as a rare haven, untouched by the repercussions of a tragic downfall. Here, whispers tell of an heir, once destined for greatness, now lost to the Shadow of Chaos that claimed him. From within the Sanctuary, a party of heroes is formed: to venture beyond its peaceful walls, confront the fractured world, and redeem what was lost.

Embark on a deck-building adventure in the legendary realm of Northanda, where magic and metaphysical gods converge. Lead a party of colorful heroes, each bringing their own unique flavor to the battlefield, through a world shaped by chaos and myth. Dive into a narrative-rich experience where strategy is the key to overcoming the challenges that await.

Gameplay Features

  • Three's a Party: Lead a trio of distinct heroes, each with their own unique skills, cards, and playstyle.
  • All Hands on Deck: Experience streamlined and strategic gameplay with a shared deck and unique mana system for your party, balancing depth and simplicity in each decision.
  • Bless to Impress: Harness the combined power of Enchantments, Artifacts, Auras, and more. Ranging from battle-long bonuses to temporary party-wide buffs, these blessings add strategic depth to every encounter.
  • Summon Up The Courage: Take control of mighty summons, each endowed with unique and formidable skills, ready to turn the tide of battle at your command.
  • Treasure Trove of Tactics: Collect a wide array of treasures and upgrades to enhance your heroes' capabilities. But beware, some treasures come with a twist – granting powerful blessings alongside perilous burdens.
  • Gem-erous Upgrades: Enhance your cards through upgrades and Gems, each adding unique mechanics or boosting stats for tailored strategic approaches.
  • Violence and Violins: Adventure through the lands of Northanda accompanied by an original orchestral soundtrack, providing an emotionally resonant and immersive backdrop to each moment of play.

Join the Adventure: Dive into the world of Talis, where every card plays a role in your journey to victory. Forge your path through challenging battles, uncover unique synergies, and lead your heroes to triumph!
